title: Si's Modular Home Is Not a Trailer
description:
A doctor, an IRS agent, and a game warden walk into Si's trailer ... and thus, a podcast was born. Come for the smack talk, stay for the Si Pad, the duck with three parents, and Martin's beef with turkeys. Also in the Duck Call Room premiere: what makes Godwin long for Black Friday, why John-David needs a bigger bathtub, and the first thing Si did with his "Duck Dynasty" money. And finally, Si addresses one of history's greatest unsolved mysteries: Who exactly is Jack, and where can we find him?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Si Robertson & Justin Martin
